LanguageData.PotassiumIodide.label: Potassium iodide
LanguageData.PotassiumIodide.description: Tablets of potassium iodide are supplied for emergency purposes related to blockade of radioiodine uptake.
LanguageData.coolingPipe.label: Coolant pipe
LanguageData.coolingPipe.description: Pipes for pumping coolant from the turbine to cooling systems. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.coolantValve.label: Coolant valve
LanguageData.coolantValve.description: Opens or closes connections between coolant pipes.
LanguageData.steamPipe.label: Steam pipe
LanguageData.steamPipe.description: Pipes for pumping high pressure steam from the reactor to turbines. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.steamValve.label: Steam valve
LanguageData.steamValve.description: Opens or closes connections between steam pipes.
LanguageData.waterPipe.label: Cold water pipe
LanguageData.waterPipe.description: Pipes for pumping cold water from the turbine or heat exchanger back to the core. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.waterValve.label: Cold water valve
LanguageData.waterValve.description: Opens or closes connections between cold water pipes.
LanguageData.HighVoltage.label: High Voltage
LanguageData.HighVoltage.description: Cable for transporting high voltage power from turbines to transformers. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.controllerLoom.label: Console Loom
LanguageData.controllerLoom.description: Wiring loom for transmitting signals between a core and a control console. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.NuclearResearchBench.label: Rimatomics research bench
LanguageData.NuclearResearchBench.description: Contains Rimatomics research projects. Requires power.
LanguageData.TableRimatomicsMachining.label: Rimatomics machining table
LanguageData.TableRimatomicsMachining.description: A work station for assembling Rimatomics technologies
LanguageData.ResearchReactor.label: Research Reactor
LanguageData.WeaponsBench.label: Weapons Research Bench
LanguageData.PlutoniumProcessor.label: Plutonium Processor
LanguageData.PlutoniumProcessor.description: A machine that uses chemicals to separate fissionable plutonium from spent nuclear fuel.
LanguageData.RimatomicsRTG.label: R.T.G
LanguageData.RimatomicsRTG.description: An electrical generator that uses an array of thermocouples to convert the heat released by the decay of a suitable radioactive material into electricity.
LanguageData.ReactorCoreA.label: Reactor Type A
LanguageData.ReactorCoreA.description: Rimatomics thermal reactor core with 21 fuel assembly capacity. A reactor core contains the fuel components where nuclear reactions take place and heat is generated
LanguageData.ReactorCoreB.label: Reactor Type X
LanguageData.ReactorCoreB.description: An advanced breeder reactor design which can generate more fissile material than it consumes.
LanguageData.ReactorCoreC.label: Reactor Type V
LanguageData.ReactorCoreC.description: A massive advanced breeder reactor design which can generate more fissile material than it consumes.
LanguageData.Turbine.label: Thor Turbine
LanguageData.Turbine.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Thor has a maximum power output of 100 Kilowatts
LanguageData.BigTurbine.label: Zeus Turbine
LanguageData.BigTurbine.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Zeus has a maximum power output of 1 Megawatt
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator.label: Radiator
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator.description: Small air coolers designed to provide cooling for small nuclear reactors when resources or space is limited
LanguageData.CoolingWater.label: Water Cooling
LanguageData.CoolingWater.description: Provides large amounts of cooling to nuclear reactors by using cold water from rivers, lakes or oceans
LanguageData.CoolingTower.label: Cooling Tower
LanguageData.CoolingTower.description: Very large air coolers designed to provide large amounts of cooling for nuclear reactors when no natural bodies of water are available
LanguageData.Transformer.label: High Voltage Transformer
LanguageData.Transformer.description: Provides the final voltage transformation from Turbine Generators, stepping down the voltage used in high voltage lines to the level used by power conduits
LanguageData.ReactorControl.label: reactor console
LanguageData.ReactorControl.description: Computer system designed to control nuclear reactors. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls, multiple controls can be open at the same time
LanguageData.storagePool.label: Storage Pool
LanguageData.storagePool.description: A storage pool for safely storing nuclear fuel rods. Right click with a selected pawn to interact and designate fuel for removal
LanguageData.RadiationDetector.label: Radiation Detector
LanguageData.RadiationShielding.label: Reinforced DU Wall
LanguageData.RadiationShielding.description: Very strong wall that is reinforced with depleted uranium, providing full shielding against radiation
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagus.description: A concrete structure designed to contain the molten core of a nuclear reactor that has undergone a core melt incident.
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagus.label: Sarcophagus Type A
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagusB.description: A concrete structure designed to contain the molten core of a nuclear reactor that has undergone a core melt incident.
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagusB.label: Sarcophagus Type X
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagusC.description: A concrete structure designed to contain the molten core of a nuclear reactor that has undergone a core melt incident.
LanguageData.ReactorSacrophagusC.label: Sarcophagus Type V
LanguageData.PoppedReactorCoreA.label: molten core
LanguageData.PoppedReactorCoreB.label: molten core
LanguageData.PoppedReactorCoreC.label: molten core
LanguageData.DU_Blastdoor.label: DU Blast door
LanguageData.DU_Blastdoor.description: Very strong blast doors that are reinforced with depleted uranium, providing full shielding against radiation.
LanguageData.PPC.label: PPC
LanguageData.PPC.description: The RA-P3 Pulsed Power Capacitor, stores large amounts of energy in a bank of ultra capacitors, which can be discharged in a single pulse by compatible Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.label: SACS
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.description: The RA-c85 Semi Automated Command Station, is required by all Rimatomics energy weapons, may require manning for certain weapons to function fully.
LanguageData.RadarDish.label: TACS
LanguageData.RadarDish.description: The RA-92 Target Acquisition and Communication System, uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets and communicate with weapon systems.
LanguageData.PPCADS.label: ADS
LanguageData.PPCADS.description: The RA-22 Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon designed for area denial and crowd control. It heats the skin of targeted human subjects causing them to break rank and flee. Does not require line of sight. Requires a manned SACS.
LanguageData.ADS_Dish.label: ADS Dish
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.label: Tesla Coil
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.description: The RA-42T Tesla Coil delivers a huge electrical arc discharge to its targets resulting in severe burns or death. 100% accurate, medium range, sets targets on fire. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting.
LanguageData.Tesla_Coil_Arc_Discharger.label: Tesla Coil Arc Discharger
LanguageData.PPCHEL.label: HEL
LanguageData.PPCHEL.description: The RA-702 High Energy Laser (HEL) destroys enemy airborne projectiles such as mortar shells. When a mortar is fired the system will check if the shell will pass through the range of a HEL, and attempt to track the target and fire once it is in range.
LanguageData.HEL_Laser.label: HEL Laser
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.label: Punisher
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.description: The RA-1802D Punisher is a 25 round magazine fed railgun platform which uses large electromagnetic pulses to launch sabot projectiles to extreme velocities and ranges. Requires line of sight. Fire mission does not require line of sight. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Requires a manned SACS.
LanguageData.Railgun_Cannon.label: Punisher Railgun
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.label: Obelisk
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.description: The RA-2152-X Obelisk is a directed energy weapon that uses a focused solid state laser to vaporize targets. 100% accurate with long range and devastating power. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting
LanguageData.Obelisk_Laser.label: Obelisk Laser
LanguageData.PPCMarauder.label: Marauder
LanguageData.PPCMarauder.description: The RA-3b Marauder is a multi-barrel coaxial plasma railgun platform, large electromagnetic pulses fire a burst of accelerated plasma toroids to extreme velocities causing explosive radiation emitting impacts. Requires a manned SACS.
LanguageData.Marauder_Railgun.label: Marauder Railgun
LanguageData.Bullet_PlasmaToroid.label: Plasma Toroid
LanguageData.MissileSilo.label: Liberator
LanguageData.MissileSilo.description: The RA-1776b Liberator is a self contained all-in-one strategic missile manufacturing and launching facility with a 5 missile magazine capacity. Requires a manned SACS to function.
LanguageData.notReal.label: notReal
LanguageData.RocketEngine.label: Rocket Engine
LanguageData.RocketEngine.description: Engines for building rocket propelled machines.
LanguageData.MissileFuselage.label: Missile Fuselage
LanguageData.FissionWarhead.label: Nuclear Warhead
LanguageData.FissionWarhead.description: An explosive device that derives its destructive force from nuclear reactions.
LanguageData.ICBM_Fission.label: strategic missile
LanguageData.NuclearWarheadIncoming.label: warhead incoming
LanguageData.ICBMStrike.label: strategic missile strike
LanguageData.turbineBlade.label: Turbine Blades
LanguageData.UraniumPellets.label: Uranium Pellets
LanguageData.UraniumPellets.description: Pellets of uranium used in the construction of nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.Plutonium.label: plutonium
LanguageData.Plutonium.description: A case of plutonium used to create nuclear weapons or nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.DepletedUraniumPellets.label: Depleted Uranium
LanguageData.DepletedUraniumPellets.description: Pellets of depleted uranium used in the construction of nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.FuelRods.label: fuel rods
LanguageData.FuelRods.description: A group of rods filled with uranium pellets, when loaded in a reactor core they generate heat which can be used to drive a turbine.
LanguageData.FuelRodsMOX.label: fuel rods MOX
LanguageData.FuelRodsMOX.description: A group of rods filled with a mix of uranium and plutonium, when loaded in a reactor core they generate heat which can be used to drive a turbine.
LanguageData.ChunkRadioactiveSlag.label: radioactive slag chunk
LanguageData.NuclearWaste.label: Nuclear Waste
LanguageData.ThrownSlag.label: ThrownSlag
LanguageData.Apparel_RadiationMask.label: radiation mask
LanguageData.Apparel_RadiationMask.description: Protect against radiation through shielding in the lining, but more importantly by preventing direct contact with or inhalation of radioactive particles or gas.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskDesert.description: Protect against radiation through shielding in the lining, but more importantly by preventing direct contact with or inhalation of radioactive particles or gas. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskDesert.label: MOPP mask(Desert)
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskWoodland.description: Protect against radiation through shielding in the lining, but more importantly by preventing direct contact with or inhalation of radioactive particles or gas. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskWoodland.label: MOPP mask(Woodland)
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskSnow.description: Protect against radiation through shielding in the lining, but more importantly by preventing direct contact with or inhalation of radioactive particles or gas. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppMaskSnow.label: MOPP mask(Snow)
LanguageData.Apparel_RadiationSuit.label: radiation suit
LanguageData.Apparel_RadiationSuit.description: A suit that protects against radiation through shielding in the lining.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitDesert.description: A suit that protects against radiation through shielding in the lining. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitDesert.label: MOPP suit(Desert)
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitWoodland.description: A suit that protects against radiation through shielding in the lining. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitWoodland.label: MOPP suit(Woodland)
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitSnow.description: A suit that protects against radiation through shielding in the lining. Combat version made with tougher materials for increased durability.
LanguageData.Apparel_MoppSuitSnow.label: MOPP suit(Snow)
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.label: Sabot Round
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.description: A kinetic energy projectile fired from a railgun.
LanguageData.Bullet_Sabot.label: Sabot Round
LanguageData.RailgunSabotDU.label: DU Sabot Round
LanguageData.RailgunSabotDU.description: A kinetic energy projectile fired from a railgun, inert and safe to stockpile.
LanguageData.Bullet_Sabot_DU.label: DU Sabot Round
LanguageData.SabotRoundIncoming.label: sabot incoming
LanguageData.DUSabotRoundIncoming.label: DU sabot incoming
LanguageData.ControlRodActuator.label: Control Rod Actuator
LanguageData.ControlRodActuator.description: Upgrade parts for the Rimatomics nuclear reactor
LanguageData.ATOM.label: ATOM
LanguageData.SCAD.label: SCAD
LanguageData.SCAD.description: Upgrade parts for Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.MEPS.label: MEPS
LanguageData.MEPS.description: Upgrade parts for Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.ALC.label: ALC
LanguageData.ALC.description: Upgrade parts for Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.ERS.label: ERS
LanguageData.ERS.description: Upgrade parts for Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.DriveActuator.label: Drive Actuator
LanguageData.DriveActuator.description: Upgrade parts for Rimatomics energy weapons
LanguageData.TargetingChip.label: Targeting Chip
LanguageData.TargetingChip.description: Upgrade parts for the Rimatomics Railgun
LanguageData.BeamSplitter.label: Beam Splitter
LanguageData.BeamSplitter.description: Upgrade parts for the Rimatomics Obelisk.
LanguageData.LenseModule.label: Lens Module
LanguageData.LenseModule.description: Upgrade parts for the Rimatomics Obelisk.
